input_args.instruction: "Context: Disease Takayasu's arteritis associates Gene HLA-B. Disease allergic rhinitis associates Gene HLA-B. \n\nQuestion: Out of the given list, which Gene is associated with Takayasu's arteritis and allergic rhinitis. Given list is: HLA-DQB2,  CRTC1,  FAM13A,  TNRC6B, HLA-B"
